quests.name: Tutorial
quests.description: You must follow the secret escape route to escape the prison.

quests.name: Deliver the Amulet
quests.description: You must deliver the Amulet of Kings to Jauffre in Weynon Priory.

quests.name: Find the Heir
quests.description: Head to Kvatch to find the last heir.

quests.name: Breaking the Siege of Kvatch
quests.description: You must help defeat the Daedra invaders and end the siege of Kvatch.

quests.name: The Battle for Castle Kvatch
quests.description: Try to save the Count of Kvatch, and rid the city of any remaining Daedra.

quests.name: Weynon Priory
quests.description: Return to the Priory with Martin.

quests.name: The Path of Dawn
quests.description: You must return to Baurus in the Imperial City to try to track down the stolen Amulet of Kings.

quests.name: Dagon Shrine
quests.description: Find and infiltrate the Mythic Dawn's shrine.

quests.name: The Wayward Knight
quests.description: You must escort Farwil and his fellow knight through the Oblivion gate to retrieve the sigil stone to close the gate.

quests.name: Attack on Fort Sutch
quests.description: Help a group of soldiers close an Oblivion Gate

quests.name: Spies
quests.description: Track down those that have been spying on Cloud Ruler Temple.

quests.name: Blood of the Daedra
quests.description: Locate a Daedric artifact for Martin.

quests.name: Blood of the Divines
quests.description: Recover the blood of a god for Martin.

quests.name: Miscarcand
quests.description: Recover a Great Welkynd Stone for Martin.

quests.name: Bruma Gate
quests.description: Help the Bruma guard close an Oblivion Gate just outside the city.

quests.name: Allies for Bruma
quests.description: You are asked to bring in reinforcements for Bruma from the other towns.

quests.name: Defense of Bruma
quests.description: Let a Great Oblivion Gate open outside of Bruma.

quests.name: Great Gate
quests.description: Find the Great Sigil Stone and close the Great Gate before a Daedric siege engine invades Tamriel!

quests.name: Paradise
quests.description: Enter Mankar's Paradise, and retrieve the Amulet of Kings.

quests.name: Light the Dragonfires
quests.description: Escort Martin to the Temple of the One... but will you be able to crown him Emperor?

quests.name: Imperial Dragon Armor
quests.description: Receive your reward for saving the world.
